title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
created_time: May 09, 2023, 08:02:21 AMLast edit: May 09, 2023, 08:49:28 AM by HB Wallet
content: Event: EatnSmile Community CampaignThe project aims to launch its first campaign this May 2023 giving away thousands of FREE mintcodes along with STAR token. By participating in the event, participants will have an opportunity to win up to 1 BNB. When acquiring mintcode, users will be able to mint NFT at no cost on Polygon and Avalanche, then list them for sale on Opensea, or place a banner for FREE on the store's landing page.üî• Link: Gleam Form‚è∞ Time: 5.5.2023 (19:00 - GMT+9) - 6.6.2023 (23:59 - GMT+9)üì∫ Demo Video: youtu.be/cXhJ4zcBspo üéÅ Prize:1st ü•á - 05 prizes - 1 BNB2nd ü•à - 20 prizes - 1 AVAX3rd ü•â - 50 prizes - 10 USDTGuaranteed prize (each participant) üßß - 10 STAR tokenüåä Opensea: https://opensea.io/collection/eatnsmileüî∂ For more information, please visit event.eatnsmile.org

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Misleading title, it's 'chance to win 1 bnb' and I know how lucky I'm so wouldn't bother with such promos in first place. The only guarantee is 10 star token and those amount to whooping 6 cents. No thank you!

comments.author: HB Wallet
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on May 09, 2023, 08:11:30 AMMisleading title, it's 'chance to win 1 bnb' and I know how lucky I'm so wouldn't bother with such promos in first place. The only guarantee is 10 star token and those amount to whooping 6 cents. No thank you! I have fixed the title. The point is participants basically cost nothing to join the event even gas fees. We will pick the winners on livestream with Google Random.
